website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use drain snake that is made of sturdy materials so it can be reused multiple times.
pros: This 20-inch snake has barbs up and down both sides to grab onto hair and other clogs in drains
Made of strong plastic so the barbs don't break easily
cons: The product broke easily for some users

customer_reviews.title: Unclogged drain
customer_reviews.text: We had a block in the shower/tub and it would not drain. I used this and it pulled up a disgusting amount of hair and the tub started draining again. After I pulled up the hair and the tub drained, I sprinkled baking powder in and then added vinegar and put the stopper on quickly and left it to clean overnight. That finished cleaning the drain and now it drains faster than it has in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: OlyNomad

customer_reviews.title: Zip-It Effectively Clears Drain with No Chemicals!!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this for cleaning out drains. I used it to clean my bathroom drain, which was quite clogged. I didn't want to use chemicals, and I didn't have to. The Zip-It quickly pulled out a massive amount of yucky stuff from the drain. Be prepared with a wad of paper towels to catch the yuck that comes out of your drain!
customer_reviews.author: Terra's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it more stars then I would. My wife has thick, long hair and usually puts it on the wall until she's done. I redid my bathroom so I know my p-trap and pipes were brand new. The water started backing up pretty substantially lately so we ordered this. One push all the way down, a couple twists, and wow, so much hair and gook came out. She couldn't believe it. I took a shower right after and everything was as good as new. Get this product instead of having a plumber come out. Also, made in the USA!! Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Zip-It is a must have for every household!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version and somehow lost along the way. This updated color and version is awesome! I think it"s a bit "sturdier" but still flexible. I worked on my bathroom sink last night (results are disgusting, but it does the job). And it's cheaper than a plumber!! I highly recommend this, not expensive and no chemicals to deal with. Win/Win!
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: The Zip It tool worked to clear our drain
customer_reviews.text: I liked the Zip It tool. It arrived in only the manufacturer packaging with an address label on it. It had been opened and then taped shut. The tool itself got the job done and cleared our shower drain. We have an old tub with old plumbing. I had to remove the water diverter switch to be able to put the zip it tool down that hole in our tub. Doing this got the large clump of gross slimy hair out and our drain is back to working like new!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee T

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my plumber
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I needed to call a plumber to unclog a sink that kept reclogging. He pulled out the Zip-It tool and removed years of hair build-up from the drain and fixed the problem quickly. He recommended that I always keep Zip-it around. I've been using it ever since to remove accumulated hair. It works great and is much cheaper than a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: MarkSD

customer_reviews.title: Best tool to unclog a drain
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Zip-It drain tool for over 6 years. My neighbor kept asking to borrow it so I decided to give her the old one and get myself a new one. I wish more people used this instead of dumping chemicals down the drain. Such a simple concept....when the sink or tub start to drain slow, I insert Zip-It and it pulls out a glob of slimy hair, done, what could be easier?
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: BEST DRAIN PRODUCT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough great things about this product. I bought one from Walmart and lost track of it - bummer because it’s cheaper in stores. This thing clears hair from tub drains like a charm. It will completely transform your daily showers, especially if you’ve been living with slow drains for far too long. Just be prepared for how much gunk this thing is going to retrieve!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A big if.
customer_reviews.text: IF you're careful and don't jam these very far down your drains, they work great at pulling up wads of hair and crud. If you push them down too far though, you'll spend more time than it's worth trying to get them out again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Hair Snake is Affordable and Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Hair Snake is the best investment I’ve made for plumbing issues (hair clogged bathroom sink drain and bathtub drain). Please note. photo of Hair Snake packaging was taken after I opened it to get Hair Snake out. It was packaged nicely when delivered, Unclogged my drains in a few minutes. Instructions easy to follow and Hair Snake easy to use. I highly recommend it! A mist have. Fat Boys delivered within a day or two of my placing order. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely give this a try if your drain is clogged due to hair..
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing about this product is that you have to be patient and wiggle a lot. That being said... it totally unclogged my shower drain. I have super long hair and lately the water hasn’t been draining so I ordered this product. It was a little tricky to use since my drain stopper doesn’t come off but I wiggled it around and I pulled out SO. MUCH. HAIR. Now my drain works perfectly. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shaktipa93

customer_reviews.title: It works to clear drains!
customer_reviews.text: You just stick this down the drain and pull it out with the gunk. It does take some wiggling to get it all the way down and back up. For a sink, I do it around the drain stopper in four places to try to clear the drain as much as possible. Removing the gunk from the stick needs a towel of some sort. I don't think it would be good to wash that stuff down the drain after you just removed it. So much better for the environment than putting chemicals down the drain that eat up the drain. I would not have nice clothes on when you do this as it is kind of messy.
customer_reviews.author: Mouse1999

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to use but worked
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to get it in popup drain but I managed to pull out a gob of hair. That cleared the problem. I can see how this could get permenantly stuck in a popup drain if you aren't careful. It all worked out for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Herman

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Easy
customer_reviews.text: I had never used one of these before, but I saw it recommended on a list of useful household supplies, so I decided to try it. I had my 14 yr old daughter use it to unclog the bathroom drain (that gets clogged with her hair), and she did it no problem
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Casey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work too well.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work that well. Too cheapy of plastic quality to work in a L or elbow shaped drain, doesn’t have enough ‘spine’ to turn the corner. Plastic barbs break off after one pull, which didn’t yield much hair. Would advise trying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Alex J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and reuse
customer_reviews.text: It says one use only for liability reasons and it would definitely tear up towels and hands, I just carefully use a paper towel to clean. Quickly unclogs the sink drain we have that is prone to clogging.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyusagi

customer_reviews.title: Best natural drain cleaner for hair and clogged drains!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best invention for unclogging drains with hair! I used to use liquids that were horrific for the environment. This is great for the environment and does not cause any harm to drains or the ecology around us. It is so simple to use and gets the job done in a very quick amount of time. I will use this method of drain unclogging and I have recommended them to friends as long as I live on planet earth!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, chemical free fix.
customer_reviews.text: Used this product on a clogged bathroom sink and it worked like a champ! Put it down the sink where it is fairly easy to get down and it will come back up fairly easily. I tried two times before I got the right spot. Pulled up hair and gunk and then put boiling water down the sink. All clear!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Walker

customer_reviews.title: So much better than chemical drain cleaners
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair that is sadly prone to falling out, and a drain that lets nothing pass! The drain gets clogged all too often. This thing is a MILLION times more effective than drain cleaner, and so much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Angie S.

customer_reviews.title: Prevents family arguments!
customer_reviews.text: If you live with people that get long hair into drains, this fixed the clogged/slow drains fast. No family arguments, thus worth every penny. As a husband. I do not have to sleep in the couch!
customer_reviews.author: Keko

customer_reviews.title: Not US made
customer_reviews.text: I expressly bought this item because it states that its US made. It's not.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing...my friend recommended it to me...my daughter has very thick curly hair and I could not believe what this pulled out of her shower drain!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews of anything but this little device is fabulous. My bathroom drain is now perfect--it grabs all the hair and icky crap and pulls it out--just takes a minute. Not pretty to see it but very, very effective. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: otter

customer_reviews.title: This is the same tool as the Zip It 00412BL Drain Cleaning Tool
customer_reviews.text: This product is useful, but order only one. You do NOT have to dispose of them after a single use. BEWARE: This is the same product as Zip It 00412BL Drain Cleaning Tool. which the seller jhas priced slightly cor one and even cheaper - $7.12 for 2! If you want to order more than one, order the Zip It 00412BL Drain Cleaning Tool . You can order 2 of the tools for $7.37 or 3 for $11.29.
customer_reviews.author: SFNewYorker

customer_reviews.title: Best tool ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing tool to own. It is so easy. Push it into drain and pull out slowly. It grabs all the hair.
customer_reviews.author: 3Ob1v7

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT easy to use. Definitely doesn't perform as it advertises. EXTREMELY sharp and will cut you!!! WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Higgons

customer_reviews.title: A REAL MONEY SAVER !
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my bathroom sink. I won't describe what I pulled up! Saved me a costly plumber bill !! GREAT PRODUCT ! Bought 4 more to give to family and friends !!
customer_reviews.author: Prim

customer_reviews.title: Great unclogger
customer_reviews.text: Lost my old one in a move. Love how these get the crap out of your drain with using yucky toxic chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: product broke off and got stuck in sink. Need to get a plumber to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: lynniesue

customer_reviews.title: Won't get into all drains.
customer_reviews.text: This will not make the immediate turn into the bathtub drain. Worthless for that drain so I tried it on the sink drain. Same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Reviews were great and the price was right, so I got suckered in. This thing is hard to use and pulled nothing out of my drain after I struggled for what felt like an eternity to pull it out. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: PA Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool. Three sticks down the drain without removing ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool. Three sticks down the drain without removing the drain stopper and the pipe is clear of the hair that had clogged it. Caution in ordering. They said free shipping. But i missed the button to click on to get the free shipping and they charged me $3.50. O! Well. It is still a good deal. I will be more careful in the future. However I will not be reordering for this one was a gift to my son and the one I have is over three years old. It appears it will last a life time.
customer_reviews.author: Playful Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive addition to your drain arsenal
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to me by the followers of the Old House Facebook page. Let's face it, old houses are wonky, and nothing short of a replumb will achieve the results we want. But this i is a nifty tool. If it clears even one drain, we're ahead. And in my experience, it does.
customer_reviews.author: Still St. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: always have handy because of my annoying long hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to have around the house... As I was excited to try this product out... I stuck it in the tub first and my tub was built in a way that I could not even get the drain tool down where the hair strands may have been. Frustrated, I than tried the sink, and it was more of a success. I would say this tool was way longer than in the picture which is great and its made out of hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: LaineTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY WORKS & THE REMEDY FOR HAIR-CLOGGED DRAIN
customer_reviews.text: Grabs all the hair inside of the drain and pulls it out for a clean drain every time! Can push it all the way to the top handle and grabs the hair and gunk and flushes the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This simple tool is great! Had a slow drain and used a whole ...
customer_reviews.text: This simple tool is great! Had a slow drain and used a whole bottle of drano with no help. The clog was higher than the trap and when I used this it was clear of hair in a couple of minutes. Problem solved and will always have one in my house to use.
customer_reviews.author: lakeview

customer_reviews.title: Cleared out Slow Drain Due to Hair Clog
customer_reviews.text: Liquid Plumr partially did the trick, but after searching on YouTube how to clear tough hair clogs in my bathroom sink, this product came up. Item arrived before the estimated delivery date. Easy to follow instructions and it cleared the clog immediately better than any drain cleaner. So simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: Use this FIRST!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to have to buy more Liquid Plummer, but this bid the trick in my shower's drain. Use this first before dumping nasty, expensive chemicals down your drain.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Simple but very useful, works as described. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: baraban

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive plastic tool pulls enormous disgusting hair & soap clogs out of drains. It works great , is easier than plunging & cheaper than a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Wild60

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Cleared the bathroom sink and tub with little effort. Hangs up a little bit but did the job.
customer_reviews.author: JM3

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great to clear hair in the drain. Ridges are very sharp and grab easily.
customer_reviews.author: Luvtoread

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for me. See photo for drain type. Did not remove the drain cap. This tool went around it and was very effective. An inexpensive solution to a hairy situation.
customer_reviews.author: Jokesbydad

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: The little hair catchers broke off easily so order extras
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Really works...
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget! I thought, well, it's only nine bucks .. plastic... maybe it'll work; if not, no great loss. But it is amazing. Took about two minutes to clear the bathroom drain. Lots of great videos about it on YouTube. I wish to personally thank the inventor!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work wonders for me. I need to unclog my bathroom sink and this doesn’t seem to curve where it needs to. It did pull out some gunk, but not enough to work. Still looking for solutions
customer_reviews.author: Italian Girl

customer_reviews.title: ... don’t be discouraged if it doesn’t pull out as easy as it went in twisted a little bit as ...
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these before missed placed it during the move had to have another one thank you so much these are indispensable for taking hair out of sinks don’t be discouraged if it doesn’t pull out as easy as it went in twisted a little bit as you pull it will come out with lots of hair
customer_reviews.author: david rauscher

customer_reviews.title: Great product, always works!
customer_reviews.text: pretty inexpensive for something that works every time to pull hair and etc. out of drains
customer_reviews.author: RonF

customer_reviews.title: Great for Clearing Slow Draining Tubs and Sinks!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for grabbing gobs (and gobs) of long hair out of the shower drain. Works best after a shower or cleaning, when everything is damp and slippery. Be warned, you will be grossed out by what you find in your drain! However, you will save yourself money down the road from avoiding harsh drain cleaners that eat away at pipes and fixtures. Item washes off completely and can be reused. Pull gently and adjust when caught on drain hole or you WILL rip the teeth off.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Too much money for a one time use.
customer_reviews.text: They work...but should be cheaper if it is a one time use product
customer_reviews.author: djs

customer_reviews.title: Must have for ladies with long hair
customer_reviews.text: I have thick long hair that sheds like crazy and tends to block up the sink and shower every few months (even with filters over the drains). This bad boy gets out the nasty, gunky hair and gets the water flowing without calling a plumber. My fiancee was so impressed with my "plumbing skills". Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ENHD

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and works like a dream.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how easy, quick this worked for my tub and sink clog. 3seconds and the clog was removed, wiped it off and stored under the cabinet for the next time. No plumber necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Gem Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Best thing to get hair out of a drain easy to use
customer_reviews.author: DEBORA WEISS

customer_reviews.title: water now draining
customer_reviews.text: this cleared the clog in my sink in no time
customer_reviews.author: S. Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Not a Zip-It
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Zip-It. Disappointed that what arrived is not the authentic tool that I expected to receive. See that my photo does not match product photo.
customer_reviews.author: AnD

customer_reviews.title: definitely handy for clearing sink drain of hair; although ...
customer_reviews.text: definitely handy for clearing sink drain of hair; although when recd, package says one time use... have resused and in decent condition
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Totally works
customer_reviews.text: This thing does exactly what it is supposed to do. I pulled out disgusting clumps of hair deep in the drain and finally, my tub drains smoothly and quickly again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Works better than drain cleaner and isn’t corrosive to the pipes.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Cleaned my drain in minutes. I plan to recuse it again.
customer_reviews.author: mucky

customer_reviews.title: Kind of works
customer_reviews.text: Kind of works. Depends on the type of drain you are trying to snake out. My tub drain has a sharp angle to it that prevented running this further into the pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S.

customer_reviews.title: I pulled some yuck from the bathroom sink but it didn't do much good in the tub which is what I was really ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit down our drain without first removing the drain cover... Might work for you. I pulled some yuck from the bathroom sink but it didn't do much good in the tub which is what I was really hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked on a tough tub drain! Seriously use this before anything else. Avoid the nasty chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Nero

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how wonderful this product works. It is stong, durable, and makes unclogging drains effortless. No more chemicals for me, I am buying one for all of my family members. Way to go green!
customer_reviews.author: OnlytheTruth

customer_reviews.title: Cleans drains out fast and effectively
customer_reviews.text: I have one shower shared between a total of 4 long-haired roommates, so I’ve tried my fair share of drain cleaners. Whatever my tub shroom doesn’t catch, this takes care of in a jiffy. I haven’t had to buy chemical drain cleaners in years thanks to this little guy. Do yourself a favor and keep a few handy!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Champlin

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work at all. It couldn't get past the first inch of our drain. It's almost too stiff, if that makes sense, to be able to bend what is required to get into a shower drain. If your shower drain is straight up and down, I'm sure it'll work great...
customer_reviews.author: A. Lampley

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it a zero, but that wasn't offered.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the picture of the weasel--very cute and he looked as if he meant business. Sad to say, it was like putting a pipe cleaner down the drain. Very flimsy. Not only did I waste my money on the "pipe cleaner", I was in such a hurry I had it sent out same day.. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Szklarski

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$'s
customer_reviews.text: It works well in the sink as well as the bathtub. The seller (packaging) says for one use only. I used it, cleaned it and hopefully if/when I need it again it will work. I followed up with baking soda and vinegar and both drains are draining nicely once again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J

customer_reviews.title: Pull out all that hair!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly on my tub and sink drains Simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Skyewoman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Works!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! I was very surprised how much hair this little gadget pulled out of my tub! Unclogged my tub in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Just what the tub drain needed, got out tons of my girlfriend's hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the Trick!
customer_reviews.text: Did what it said it would. Just a heads up, it's over 2 feet long, wasn't expecting that. And it says it's a one use only. Just so you know.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased
customer_reviews.text: It's embarrassing to describe how well this works. Inexpensive and simple - can't beat it. Needless to say, the results were disgusting, but the drains are finally draining again!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This is a waste of money.  It is so flimsy you cannot use it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to clean under the refrigerator, but it is so flimsy it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and gets the job done, quickly and neatly! Note, if drain has 'L' joint midway down, like some shower drains, one cannot get the tool to bend around it. But for relatively straight drains, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: CaptNemo

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS GOOD AS ADVERTSED
customer_reviews.text: THE LITTLE TEETH BROKE OFF IN SEVERAL PLACES AFTER ONE USE.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE RUMSEY

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome
customer_reviews.text: for something as simple looking it really works. a friend recommended it. although it did not remove as much as I expected from the drain it did remove enough that the drain run out normally!
customer_reviews.author: George W. McKinniss

customer_reviews.title: will save you a fortune
customer_reviews.text: A friend clued me in about this item.You will save hundreds of dollars because you will never have to call a plumber again to unclog a drain.
customer_reviews.author: cheri  lynn yager

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: It does EXACTLY what it says! Unclogged our drains in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Glamazon

customer_reviews.title: You have to have this
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful item to have around. I think it will last a long time and prevent plumbers from coming out It's one of those items you just have to have.
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: Got a ton of hair out, and can definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a ton of hair out, and can definitely be used multiple times. Our older standalone sink drain didn't damage it much, used twice, and a few more before it needs to be tossed.
customer_reviews.author: Lara E

customer_reviews.title: Tool
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, not as flexible as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Debi Wellmeier

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Cleaned a stubborn bathtub and bathroom sink that even the harsh chemical products wouldn't fix. Took 10 mins max, and it's 100% reusable...as long as you don't mind cleaning the gunk off. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: sportredsox

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING! I have very long hair
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! I have very long hair, and despite all my efforts a lot of it ends up in the drain. The teeth on the Zip-It grab anything in its way. You wouldn't believe what came out of the drain. It is advertised as single use- but if you can get over the ice-factor of removing the offending gook and cleaning it you can use it over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Shonnon Llamas Schey

customer_reviews.title: This is great at cleaning hair out of a drain
customer_reviews.text: This is great at cleaning hair out of a drain, but it's not so good with the buildup of gunk that covers the inside of a pipe. It does the job, and works for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: it worked...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this prodect very much got the job done in minutes used it for the bathroom sink..... sorry no pics...
customer_reviews.author: sosy dunsmore

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as more flexible ones
customer_reviews.text: Not flexible enough to get down drain well. Barbs on the side make it hard to get out when you do get it in
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Scymanski

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how much hair it pulled out!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use with excellent results. I couldn't believe how much hair it pulled out of my drain!!
customer_reviews.author: Terra Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: You can’t make it simple to respond can you
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift so we can’t rate the cleaning tool
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well
customer_reviews.text: I needed to unblock the bathroom sink, which was clogged by the hair of the previous tenant. This did the job! The packaging warns in very strong terms about the sharp teeth along the length of the item. I didn't think they were all that sharp, but I suppose it's best to be safe. If you prick your finger, you have only yourself to blame.
customer_reviews.author: Glen B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for unclogging my tub drain and is super easy to use I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kegler

customer_reviews.title: Only Works on Very Specific Drains
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work on any of our drains. If you buy one, make sure your drain doesn't have a lower-level "stopper". Also, make sure your drain circumference is very small; otherwise, it's like sticking a serrated chopstick down a donut-hole.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Stone

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Sometimes it slices your hand up though, so be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Terra Universalis

customer_reviews.title: It works great for pulling hair and other gunk out of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product twice. It works great for pulling hair and other gunk out of my drains. So much better than pouring chemicals in the drains. I have to use it every couple of months due to my own and my granddaughter's long hair that washes down the drain in spite of trying to prevent that from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila S

customer_reviews.title: Just use wire
customer_reviews.text: Fit in my drain, but was too flimsy and didn't work. Ended up using a length of 20 gauge wire that I bent at the end and was able to remove the clog much better.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy for some drains, may work for others
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described but did not work for our drain. When pushing it in, it was too flimsy and bent backwards on itself rather than following the drain and it's bend. Got a bit of junk out from inserting it, so it would definitely work with the right drain.

customer_reviews.text: This will allow me to get the clog out without having to try to get it out with items that were not able to do the job. I am so happy this exists. Thank you for carrying it, for delivering it quickly for a very fair price.

product_meta.title: Cobra Products Zip-It Drain Cleaning Tool, 1-Pack
product_meta.description: Size:0.17The Zip-It drain cleaning tool is an amazingly fast and easy way to clear clogged and slow-running sink, shower and bath tub drains. It's specially engineered barbs combined with its flexible polymer construction make this tool effective and easy to use. There's no bulky equipment. No harsh chemicals and its non-toxic. A great, environmentally friendly alternative in clearing clogged drains. Protective eyewear recommended with use.
feature_bullets: Unclogs sink, shower and bathtub drains
Environmentally safe way to clear clogged and slow running drains
Designed, machined and assembled in the USA
